bibl.title: Deir al-Baramus, Excavations at the So-called Site of Moses the Black (1994-1999).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: Archaeological team of Leiden University, 1994-1999. - Historical Outline: Deir al-Baramus (Monastery of the Romans in the Wadi al-Natrun). - The excavation (The tower, ca. 400 AD; - The Church and the cemetery; - Living quarters; - The outer wall; - Preliminary conclusions).
INNEMÉE Karel C., Deir al-Baramus, Excavations at the So-called Site of Moses the Black (1994-1999).
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 39 (2000) pp. 123-135, 4 figg.
